title: Webscraping
snippet:
We are looking for solutions to scrape all jobs in Biotech. 
We like to scrape the websites of biotech companies (we can povide the urls)
It would even be better if we could crawl to find companies that are Biotech. So that we don't need the urls to be provided. 
The data should be structured, so that we can upload it onto our platform.
The job should be redone on a daily or weekly basis.

Who can write us the code?
